# List of international presidential trips made by Nicușor Dan

This is a list of international presidential trips made by Nicușor Dan during his time as President of Romania since 26 May 2025
List
2025

! scope=col | City
! scope=col | Date
! scope=col | Notes

Meeting with President Maia Sandu
|-
|
|The Hague
|24–25 June
|Dan attended the 2025 NATO summit.
|-
|
|Copenhagen
|2 October
|Attended the 7th European Political Community Summit.
|-
|}
